participant_2.background:
I live in a rural area, where I can enjoy horseback riding and keep my mind off my loss.
i am an angry person.
I'm not really close to my family, but I love my pet dogs.
my car has to be as fast as my motorcycle.
i work on a farm.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm just getting ready for my shift at the farm.
What kind of farm do you work on?
It's a small family farm, and we raise a variety of animals, including cows, pigs, chickens, and horses.
That sounds like a lot of work!
It can be, but it's also very rewarding. I love working with animals, and it's nice to be able to produce food for my family and friends.
I can imagine! Do you have any pets of your own?
Yes, I have two dogs, a golden retriever and a beagle. They're my best friends!
Aww, that's cute! I love dogs.
Me too! They're such great companions.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy riding horses, hiking, and fishing. I also like to spend time with my family and friends.
Those all sound like great hobbies!
Thanks! I try to keep busy.
Haha, yeah, I like to stay active.
I'm the same way. I like to stay busy and keep my mind occupied.
